data.title: Fribourg – Old Town Historic Private Guided Tour
data.meta_description: As the sun sets on the cobblestone streets of Fribourg's Old Town, a journey through time awaits those who embark on the historic private guided tour. Led by
data.text:
As the sun sets on the cobblestone streets of Fribourg’s Old Town, a journey through time awaits those who embark on the historic private guided tour. Led by an expert guide, participants are transported to a bygone era, where the echoes of the past reverberate through the charming alleyways.

From the stately buildings that stand as silent witnesses to centuries of history, to the hidden gems that reveal themselves to those with a keen eye, this tour promises a captivating exploration of Fribourg’s rich heritage.

But what secrets lie within the city’s ancient walls? What tales will be unveiled on this immersive journey? Join the discussion and uncover the allure of Fribourg’s Old Town.

Good To Know

Image Credit: Viator.com

The price for the Fribourg – Old Town Historic Private Guided Tour starts at £392.76 per group of up to 15 people.

The tour offers a great opportunity to explore the rich history of the city.

Viator guarantees the lowest price for this experience.

The tour is non-refundable and cannot be canceled or amended.

Tour Details

Image Credit: Viator.com

The tour details of the Fribourg Historic Private Guided Tour provide an engaging and informative experience of Fribourg’s Old Town. With a price starting from £392.76 per group (up to 15 people), this tour offers a great option for those looking to explore the city’s rich history.

Viator guarantees the lowest price for this experience. The tour includes a private guide who’ll meet and pick up the participants at Fribourg Train Station.

One of the highlights of the tour is a visit to the Fontaine Jo Siffert de Jean Tinguely.

It’s important to note that this experience is non-refundable, and cancellation or amendments aren’t allowed.

With these tour details, visitors can compare prices and be aware of the cancellation policy before booking their Fribourg Historic Private Guided Tour.

Inclusions

Included in the Fribourg Historic Private Guided Tour is a knowledgeable private guide who will lead you on an exploration of Fribourg’s Old Town. This tour guide is not just a local expert, but also possesses a deep understanding of the cultural significance of the landmarks you will visit. They will provide insightful commentary and engage you with fascinating stories about the history and heritage of Fribourg.

To give you an overview of the inclusions, here is a table outlining what you can expect during the tour:

Inclusions Details Private tour guide Expert guide with in-depth knowledge Meeting and pickup Convenient meeting point at the train station Visit to Fontaine Jo Siffert de Jean Tinguely Explore this iconic fountain Non-refundable experience Once booked, the experience cannot be canceled or amended

Meeting and Pickup

Image Credit: Viator.com

As you embark on the Fribourg Historic Private Guided Tour, your journey begins with a convenient meeting and pickup at Burger King, located at Fribourg Train Station. This meeting point offers a central location for easy access and ensures that you can start your tour without any hassle. The tour guide will be waiting for you with a signboard, making it easy to spot them. However, if you prefer an alternative meeting point, you can discuss the logistics with the tour provider in advance.

Once the group is gathered, the tour will commence, taking you on a fascinating exploration of Fribourg’s Old Town. From the meeting point, you’ll be guided to various historic sites and landmarks, including the iconic Jo Siffert fountain near the Train Station.

Get ready to explore the rich history and charm of Fribourg’s Old Town on this engaging private tour.

Questions

Image Credit: Viator.com

Have any questions about the Fribourg Historic Private Guided Tour? Here are some common questions that visitors may have regarding the tour:

What’s the cancellation policy for this tour?

Is customer satisfaction guaranteed?

Are there any restrictions on amending or canceling the tour?

The cancellation policy for the Fribourg Historic Private Guided Tour is mentioned as non-refundable, and no amendments or cancellations are allowed. This means that once you have booked the tour, you’re committed to it and can’t make any changes or receive a refund.

When it comes to customer satisfaction, there’s no specific information mentioned in the article. However, as a general rule, tour operators strive to provide a high level of customer satisfaction. It’s always a good idea to check the Viator Help Center for any assistance or additional information you may need.

Please note that the information provided here is based on the available details in the article and may be subject to change. It’s recommended to reach out to the tour operator directly for the most accurate and up-to-date information.

Pricing and Payment

Image Credit: Viator.com

The next aspect to consider when planning your Fribourg Historic Private Guided Tour is pricing and payment. The price for this tour starts from £392.76 per group, accommodating up to 15 people. Unfortunately, there’s no information available regarding individual pricing or any potential discounts or promotions.

It’s important to note that this experience is non-refundable, and cancellations or amendments aren’t allowed.

When it comes to payment methods, the article doesn’t provide any specific details. However, it’s common for tour operators to offer various payment options such as credit cards, debit cards, or online payment platforms. It’s advisable to reach out to the tour operator or check their website for further information on available payment methods.

Directions

Image Credit: Viator.com

To begin your Fribourg Historic Private Guided Tour, head to the meeting point at Burger King located at Fribourg Train Station. From there, your knowledgeable tour guide will lead you on a fascinating journey through the hidden gems of Fribourg’s Old Town, uncovering the city’s rich history along the way.

Start your exploration at Fontaine Jo Siffert de Jean Tinguely, a stunning fountain that pays homage to the renowned Swiss race car driver. Learn about the inspiration behind the fountain and its significance to the city.

Wander through the narrow, picturesque streets of the Old Town, marveling at the well-preserved medieval architecture and charming squares.

Discover the secrets of Fribourg’s past as your guide shares stories and anecdotes about significant landmarks and historical events that shaped the city.

With a private tour guide leading the way, you can delve deeper into Fribourg’s hidden gems and gain a deeper understanding of its fascinating history.

Common Questions

Image Credit: Viator.com

Are There Any Age Restrictions for the Fribourg Old Town Private Guided Tour?

Children are allowed on the Fribourg old town private guided tour. The duration of the tour is not specified.

Can I Bring My Pet on the Tour of Fribourg’s Old Town?

Yes, pets are allowed on the tour of Fribourg’s Old Town. However, it is important to be mindful of local regulations on pets in public spaces. There are also pet-friendly hotels in Fribourg for your convenience.

Is There a Dress Code for the Tour?

There is no specific dress code mentioned for the tour. However, it is recommended to dress comfortably and respectfully, keeping in mind the cultural norms of the area.

Can I Request a Specific Language for the Private Tour Guide?

Yes, guests can request a specific language for their private tour guide. The qualifications of the tour guide will ensure a knowledgeable and engaging experience for guests in their preferred language.

Is There a Minimum Group Size Requirement for Booking the Fribourg Old Town Private Guided Tour?

There is no minimum group size requirement for booking the Fribourg Old Town Private Guided Tour. Solo travelers are allowed to book as well. So whether you’re on your own or with a group, you can enjoy this historic tour.

The Sum Up

Image Credit: Viator.com

Discover the enchanting beauty and rich history of Fribourg’s Old Town on a private guided tour.

Led by a knowledgeable tour guide, this immersive experience allows you to explore the city’s iconic landmarks and explore its fascinating past.

With convenient pickup and a guaranteed low price, this tour offers excellent value for money.

Don’t miss the opportunity to learn about the captivating charm and cultural significance of Fribourg’s Old Town.

Book your private guided tour today!
